sn51.10:3.1: bahuputtaṃ cetiyaṃ → bahuputtakacetiyaṃ (s1-3, km, pts1, mr), sārandadaṃ cetiyaṃ → sārandadacetiyaṃ (s1-3) | ānandacetiyaṃ (mr) | sānandaraṃ (katthaci)
sn51.10:9.1: parinibbātu dāni sugato → parinibbātu sugato (bj, s1-3, km)
sn51.10:17.2: Ossaṭṭhe ca → ossaṭṭhe pana (pts1) | osajje pana (mr), devadundubhiyo → devadudrabhiyo (mr)
